items.content_html: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
items.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

items.content_html: Lightweight web-based tool for analyzing running form using MediaPipe Pose. Detects posture issues like low knee drive and excessive forward lean from video input. Built for runners, coaches, and AI experiments.
items.title: kijja-cha/run-form-ai: Lightweight web-based tool for analyzing running form using MediaPipe Pose. Detects posture issues like low knee drive and excessive forward lean from video input. Built for runners, coaches, and AI experiments.

items.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

items.content_html: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
